claims.claim: AI-powered diagnostic systems can detect certain cancers with accuracy comparable to experienced radiologists.
claims.evidence: AI-powered diagnostic systems can detect certain cancers with accuracy comparable to experienced radiologists.

claims.claim: Machine learning models can identify patterns that human clinicians often miss.
claims.evidence: Machine learning models can also identify patterns that human clinicians often miss.

claims.claim: Hospitals are using AI systems to optimize staff scheduling
claims.evidence: Hospitals are using AI systems to optimize staff scheduling

claims.claim: AI systems can reduce patient wait times
AI systems can predict hospital readmissions
Ethical guidelines are essential to AI applications
claims.evidence: Ethical guidelines are essential to ensure fairness and privacy in AI applications

claims.evidence: ensure fairness and privacy in AI applications

claims.claim: Patient data privacy remains a significant challenge
claims.evidence: Patient data privacy remains a significant challenge, especially when large datasets are used to train machine learning models.
